blogPost.excerpt: Beatflyer is the most powerful social media posts creator with a wide-range of effects which can also sync to the music. Import your designs, design from scratch, or start from one of the crafted templates.
blogPost.body: Beatflyer is the most powerful social media posts creator with a wide-range of effects which can also sync to the music. Import your designs, design from scratch, or start from one of the crafted templates.
blogPost.title: Beatflyer 2.0 - Social media posts on steroids
blogPost.author: Christian Giordano

localize.description: Beatflyer是最强大的社交媒体帖子创建者，具有广泛的效果，也可以同步到音乐。导入你的设计，从头开始设计，或从精心制作的模板之一开始。
Beatflyer是最強大的社交媒體帖子創建者，具有廣泛的效果，也可以同步到音樂。導入你的設計，從頭開始設計，或從精心製作的模板之一開始。

previous.excerpt: Campah is the easiest way to tie all your content together. Simply claim a URL, set up your link cards, and share your link! You'll have a live page in a minute.
previous.title: Campah - A space for everything you create

localize.description: Campah是将您的所有内容联系在一起的最简单方法。只需申请一个URL，设置你的链接卡，然后分享你的链接! 您将在一分钟内拥有一个实时页面。
localize.tagline: 为您创造的一切提供一个空间

localize.description: Campah是將您的所有內容聯繫在一起的最簡單方法。只需申請一個URL，設置你的鏈接卡，然後分享你的鏈接! 您將在一分鐘內擁有一個實時頁面。
localize.tagline: 爲您創造的一切提供一個空間

next.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
next.title: Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）为中小型传统企业（水电工、制造业等）做商业估值，比现有服务快5倍，便宜10倍。用户上传财务资料，进行调查，我们的模型就会生成估值。
localize.tagline: 为 "大街 "公司进行自动商业评估。

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）爲中小型傳統企業（水電工、製造業等）做商業估值，比現有服務快5倍，便宜10倍。用戶上傳財務資料，進行調查，我們的模型就會生成估值。
localize.tagline: 爲 "大街 "公司進行自動商業評估。
